title: How to listen to music by using a Bluetooth headsetï¼Ÿ
answer:
Select Menu -> Settings -> Connectivity -> Bluetooth-> Search for Devices
or Menu->Tools->Bluetooth-> Search for Devices. After searching, select the Bluetooth headset from the list of Bluetooth devices, and then pair the Bluetooth headset with the M635. After the Bluetooth headset and the phone are paired successfully, the headset connects to the phone. Then you can listen to the music through the Bluetooth headset.
